resources.string: Victory! 🥳🎉 you won with %1$d moves. You found %2$d ships and %3$d splashes!
Are you ready to get splashed?
This is a single-player mini version of the classic Battleship
Locate every enemy ship in the fewest moves possible. Each move is crucial for victory and beat your own record!

1. Choose your challenge:
 Begin selecting your difficulty: 6x6, 8x8, or 10x10. This defines the size of the board and the number of ships.
 2. Explore the ocean:
 If it's not a ship, you're just floating!.
 3. Battle report:
 • HIT! (🛳): You just found a ship! Continue exploring the board.
 • SPLASH! (🌊): There was just water. Adjust your aim and keep trying!
The game ends when all ships have been found. Celebrate the triumph and work towards improving your score each game!
May the winds be in your favor, Captain!
